titleStmt.title: A caueat for suerties two sermons of suertiship, made in Bristoll, by VV. Burton.
titleStmt.author: Burton, William, d. 1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field, for Tobie Cooke dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Tygers-head.,
